resources.string:
"Chem: from Ac to Zr v1.0.0
Alex Doan Daniel Kinney Robert Valladares John-Paul Steed Taylor Veith Victoria Rivas
Tips to navigate:
Unit Converter
Choose the conversion type from the drop-down menu first Choose your from - to units first by pressing on the drop-down menus Enter the value of the unit to convert at the bottom and press "Calculate" Result is displayed under the "Calculate" button
Compound Search
Choose from compounds displayed or search from the bar at the top Can search via compound formula or compound name If searching by formula: * Search is case sensitive! * Don't forget parentheses if in the formula If searching by compound name: * Start typing in the compound name * Choose the compound from the list generated Choose a compound for conversion of grams to moles
Elements
Elements displayed in the list by the atomic number Search for elements at the top of the screen by name Choose an element for additional information and conversion from grams to moles
Periodic Table
Table will display in landscape - rotate your phone! Zoom in to the display as normal"
Have a question, suggestion, or bug to report? Let us know here.
this is the container for the splash screen
